channel.title: crontab on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in crontab on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] I made a system that automatically decides whether to run tomorrow with Python and adds it to Google Calendar.
item.description: ## Introduction On weekdays, I basically run every day, but of course I don’t feel like running on a rainy day or a holiday. So, I tried writing a program in Python that automates the decision whether to run the next day and adds an appointment to Google Calendar. Environment macOS, Linux python 3.8.1 Since we use crontab to execute periodically, we assume macOS or Linux, but if you use AWS etc.

item.title: [Python] Raspai? What? Level of hardware inexperienced I made a system to understand if there are people in the office
item.description: #Introduction Hello. I am currently working as an intern at an IT company while being a university student in Nagoya. However, when I spend most of my time, I want to work and work on days other than the default workday. After taking a lecture at university, go to work. On such a day, I come to work around 6pm and work until there are no more employees (the office is closed).
